title: Patch Notes
content:
d a bug causing damage riders to be added multiple times in Honour Mode. Fixed Sneak Attack not activating for actions that spawn additional projectiles, like Curving Shot.

Fixed an issue causing you to get stuck at a 0% loading screen when attempting to join a multiplayer session that uses mods. The Mod Verification window will now trigger regardless of where the request to connect to a multiplayer game is coming from. Replaced the third-party mod warning with clearer messaging.
